# attitude

**Instance Property**

The attitude of the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var attitude: CMAttitude { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMAttitude] object represents a measurement of attitude—that is, the orientation of a body relative to a given frame of reference.
